fieldUpdates.formula: IF(OR(ISPICKVAL( GE_HQ_CMF_Request_Status__c ,'Rejected-CMF'), ISPICKVAL( GE_HQ_CMF_Request_Status__c ,'Rejected'), ISPICKVAL( GE_HQ_CMF_Request_Status__c ,'On Hold-CMF'), ISPICKVAL( GE_HQ_CMF_Request_Status__c ,'Hold')), if(ISNULL(GE_OG_Pending_User_Review_Counter__c) ,1, GE_OG_Pending_User_Review_Counter__c+1) , PRIORVALUE(GE_OG_Pending_User_Review_Counter__c))

rules.description: To update the SFDC " Request Status " field for CMF Request Status of Rejected KYC-CMF (M).
To Update the SFDC " Request Status " field and Reset the Web Service Response Status field For CMF Request Status of Rejected-CMF(R,E).

rules.formula: AND(ISCHANGED(GE_HQ_CMF_Request_Status__c), OR(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(GE_HQ_Request_Status__c),'Submitted to CMF'),ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(GE_HQ_Request_Status__c),'Submitted to CC'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(GE_HQ_Request_Status__c),'Pending CMF'),ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(GE_HQ_Request_Status__c),'Submitted to CC')), OR(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(GE_HQ_CMF_Request_Status__c),'D'),ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(GE_HQ_CMF_Request_Status__c),'Approved'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(GE_HQ_CMF_Request_Status__c),'Rejected-CMF'),ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(GE_HQ_CMF_Request_Status__c),'Rejected')), OR(GE_HQ_GE_Status_Flag__c = 'A',GE_HQ_GE_Status_Flag__c = ''))

AND(ISCHANGED(GE_HQ_Request_Status__c), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(GE_HQ_Request_Status__c),'New'), OR(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(GE_HQ_Request_Status__c),'CC Pending'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(GE_HQ_Request_Status__c),'Pending CMF'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(GE_HQ_Request_Status__c),'Submitted to CC'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(GE_HQ_Request_Status__c),'Submitted to CMF')) )

rules.fullName: Populate billing_city%2FZip OR shipping_city%2FZip whenever any 4 of these changes
rules.description: Populate billing city ,billing zipcode OR shipping city,shpping Zipcode when any four of these field changes. while consuming or pushing through MDM on the L.E
rules.formula: (OR(ISCHANGED( Custom_Billing_City__c ) , ISNEW() )) || (OR(ISCHANGED( Custom_Shipping_City__c) , ISNEW() )) || (OR(ISCHANGED( Custom_billing_Zip_Postal_code__c ) , ISNEW() )) || (OR(ISCHANGED( Custom_shipping_Zip_Postal_code__c ) , ISNEW() ))
